title: Pride & Prejudice
actors: Keira Knightley, Talulah Riley, Rosamund Pike, Jena Malone
plot: The protagonist Elizabeth Bennett is a witty, sarcastic, somewhat stubborn young lady who really has an opinion about quite a lot including why she would not marry simply because of it is expected of her. Mr. Guy Darcy is a shy, rich, man who defiantly believes there is such a thing as superior birth.
awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 13 wins & 52 nominations.
